'''Charlotte Hope''' is a British actress.

She plays [[Myranda]] in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. She was announced in the role on 28 June 2012.<ref>[http://wicnet.tumblr.com/post/26084130142/charlotte-hope-joins-the-cast  WiC.net Tumblr]</ref> So far, she has appeared in the [[Season 3|third]], [[Season 4|fourth]] and [[Season 5|fifth]] seasons.

Beside her role in ''Game of Thrones'', she has appeared in ''Waking the Dead'', ''Missing'' and ''Casualty''. She appeared in ''The Theory of Everything'' alongside fellow ''Game of Thrones'' actors [[Harry Lloyd]] and [[Enzo Cilenti]], and in the upcoming movie ''The Invisible Woman'' with ''Game of Thrones'' star [[Michelle Fairley]].
